documentation.text: @dev Displays winning solution on the blockchain.

@dev String A represents the viewpoint and argument of side A;
      String B represents the viewpoint and argument of side B;
@dev Arbitration Fee as a percentage of the total balance of the contract. Base fee is 5%.

@dev solutionToSender stores solutions and addresses of solutions providers.
      indexToVoters stores a dynamic array of voter addresses.
@dev Constructor initiates String A and String B with the parameters.
@dev Adds a solution to the dispute. Capped at 10 solutions.
@dev Increases votes for the index of the solution being voted. Capped at 100 votes.
@dev Pays out the arbitration fee to the address of the highest voted solution.
@dev Restricts solutions sending time to 2 days.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "time expired for voting on a solution"

arguments.value: time expired for voting on a solution

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "time expired for voting on a solution"

constructor.details: Constructor initiates String A and String B with the parameters.

payArbitrationFees().details: Pays out the arbitration fee to the address of the highest voted solution.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

sendSolution(string).details: Adds a solution to the dispute. Capped at 10 solutions.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

vote(uint256).details: Increases votes for the index of the solution being voted. Capped at 100 votes.

A.details: String A represents the viewpoint and argument of side A;      String B represents the viewpoint and argument of side B;

feePercentage.details: Arbitration Fee as a percentage of the total balance of the contract. Base fee is 5%.

finalSolution.details: Displays winning solution on the blockchain.

solutionToSender.details: solutionToSender stores solutions and addresses of solutions providers.      indexToVoters stores a dynamic array of voter addresses.
